nml_option.name: config_internal_waves_vert_levels
nml_option.description: Number of vertical levels in internal waves test case. Typical value is 20.
nml_option.possible_values: Any positive integer number greater than 0.

nml_option.name: config_internal_waves_use_distances
nml_option.description: Logical flag that determines if locations of features are defined by distances of fractions. False means fractions.

nml_option.name: config_internal_waves_surface_temperature
nml_option.description: Temperature of the surface in the northern half of the domain.

nml_option.name: config_internal_waves_bottom_temperature
nml_option.description: Temperature of the bottom in the northern half of the domain.

nml_option.name: config_internal_waves_temperature_difference
nml_option.description: Maximum temperature difference in the amplitude.

nml_option.name: config_internal_waves_amplitude_width_frac
nml_option.description: Percent of domain in Y direction the initial amplitude should exist over.

nml_option.name: config_internal_waves_amplitude_width_dist
nml_option.description: Width in Y direction the initial amplitude should exist over. Default is relative to a 250km domain.

nml_option.name: config_internal_waves_bottom_depth
nml_option.description: Depth of the bottom of the ocean for the internal waves test case.

nml_option.name: config_internal_waves_salinity
nml_option.description: Salinity of the water in the entire domain.

nml_option.name: config_internal_waves_layer_type
nml_option.description: Logical flag that controls how the initial conditions should be generated.

nml_option.name: config_internal_waves_isopycnal_displacement
nml_option.description: Max distance isopycnal layers are displaced upwards.
nml_option.possible_values: Any positive real number, typically 10 to 100.
